title: Dictionary Basics Practice
instructions: Practice creating dictionaries, accessing values safely, adding/removing items, and checking key existence.
hints: Use copy() then update() to merge dictionaries
Use get() to safely access dictionary values
Loop through keys, checking if current value is dict
Use dictionary comprehension to swap: {v: k for k, v in d.items()}
description: Practice creating dictionaries, accessing values safely, adding/removing items, and checking key existence.
